query: Please create a 3-day travel plan for a group of 3 people, starting from Salt Lake City and heading to Miami. The travel dates are from March 14th to March 16th, 2022. Our budget for the trip is $5,300. We are traveling with pets, so it is crucial that our accommodations allow them.
